ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Prepare for another nerf... =8^P
ygData.msgSnippet: Does he expect anyone to believe they JUST found this?  and can anyone find that post from way back where he said that they would not make any changes that
ygData.messageBody:
Does he expect anyone to believe they JUST found this? and can anyone find
that post from way back where he said that they would not make any changes
that seriously upset the balance of the game so far into it? cause this
sure as hell does. sigh...

Shada

> Abashi:
> In any case, I doubt that it will be as valuable after
> tomorrow. We found a
> bug with the way "haste" items stack with "haste" spells.
> Basically, even
> the worst haste item combined with the worst haste spell
> would put the
> wearer at the haste cap. This basically invalidated the
> better haste items
> and spells, and explains why people have been saying that the
> newer haste
> items aren't any better than the FBSS.
>
> This is being fixed in tomorrow's patch.
